DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether intervention vitamin D fish oil supplement reduce risk heart failure among adult men woman follow period five year ( start time randomization parent VITAL trial ) . The investigator hypotheses vitamin D fish oil supplement reduce risk heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: Intervention With Vitamin D Omega-3 Supplements Incident Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: For ancillary study ongoing parent VITAL trial , adjudicate incident heart failure case occur time period five year start randomization subject parent VITAL study . Intention-to-treat analysis use assess efficacy vitamin D well omega-3 fatty acid .
DOC.criteria: Men age 50 old woman age 55 old Be consume 800 IU vitamin D supplemental source combine ( individual vitamin D supplement , calcium+vitamin D supplement , medication vitamin D [ e.g. , Fosamax Plus D ] , multivitamin ) , , take , willing decrease forego use trial ; Be consume 1200 mg/d calcium supplemental source combine , , take , willing decrease forego use trial ; Not take fish oil supplement , , take , willing forego use trial prevalent heart failure History cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) , heart attack , stroke , transient ischemic attack , angina pectoris , CABG , PCI History renal failure dialysis , hypercalcemia , hypo hyperparathyroidism , severe liver disease ( cirrhosis ) , sarcoidosis granulomatous disease active chronic tuberculosis Wegener 's granulomatosis ; Allergy fish soy
